title: 10 Scottish Courses That Should Host The Ryder Cup
headline: 10 Scottish Courses That Should Host The Ryder Cup
description: Gleneagles's PGA Centenary isn't in anybody's Top 100. It's just the kind of brawny layout with lots of space that is typically chosen to host the Ryder Cup. Here are the 10 Scottish courses that the Ryder Cup should be played on, like Trump International Golf Links.
short_headline: 10 Scottish Courses That Should Host The Ryder Cup
page_title: 10 Scottish Courses That Should Host The Ryder Cup
slug: 10 Scottish Courses That Should Host The Ryder Cup
body: Gleneagles's PGA Centenary isn't in anybody's Top 100. It's just the kind of brawny layout with lots of space that is typically chosen to host the Ryder Cup. Here are the 10 Scottish courses that the Ryder Cup should be played on, like Trump International Golf Links.
